scripts.heroku-prebuild: echo '=== ls -R (repo root) ===' && ls -R && echo '=== FRONTEND PACKAGE.JSON ===' && cat frontend/package.json && echo '=== END PACKAGE.JSON ===' && echo '=== installing frontend deps ===' && npm install --prefix frontend --no-audit --no-fund && echo '=== done npm install, now list node_modules/frontend ===' && ls frontend/node_modules && echo '=== done listing node_modules ==='
scripts.heroku-postbuild: echo '=== running vite build (cd frontend) ===' && cd frontend && npm run build && echo '=== build done, copying dist ===' && cp -r dist/* ../backend/src/main/resources/static/ && echo '=== copy complete ==='
